data.name: Red Algorithm - Fernando
data.detailed_description:
Purchase premium hero Fernando in Red Algorithm to support the game and have some fun.

Details

  • This DLC doesn't contain any files to download, it just unlocks the hero
  • To unlock the hero with the DLC you need an active connection to Steam
  • To see all heroes please make sure that “premium heroes” is set to “always” in settings
  • The DLC configuration (hero name, native bonuses, starting weapon, consumables and perk, etc.) could be changed in one of the future balance updates

Hero stats and equipment

  • Native strengths: [Reload speed +15%] [Hit speed +10%] [Range +5%]
  • Native weakness: [Dodge -10%] [Accuracy -5%]
  • Starting weapon: Renaissance (4) shotgun
  • Starting perk: Collector (increases chance to find bonuses and runes)
  • Starting consumables: 4 barricades
  • Favourite skills: shotguns and rifles
